radiographic_examinations.findings: Numerous nonspecific focal lesions (measuring ≤8 mm in diameter) throughout the periventricular and corona radiata white matter; lesions did not show enhancement after gadolinium administration.

Heterogeneously hypoechoic parenchymal nodules (≤1 cm in diameter) in the right hepatic lobe; appearance reminiscent of macronodular cirrhosis. Patent portal vein with normal waveforms and flow velocity.
Splenomegaly with no evidence of varices.
Heterogeneous hepatic parenchymal enhancement; splenomegaly without evidence of varices or ascites; bile ducts not dilated.
